text.Prompt:
Given a item title and item features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item title:
Rothco P/T Marines T-Shirt

Item features:
100% Polyester
Quality tested and ensured for maximum durability
Designed with only the toughest, roughest users in mind
Comfort and Performance come hand in hand with Rothco

Product description:
text.Response A: Rothco makes quality outdoor and sports gear for all types of situations. Whether you are in a combat-intensive environment, or if you are a recreational user, Rothco will fit the lifestyle of many. Quality tested for maximum durability, comfort and performance come hand in hand with Rothco. This Marines T-Shirt is made of 100% polyester.
text.Response B: The Rothco P/T Marines T-Shirt is made of high-quality polyester and is designed to withstand tough and rigorous use. Its durable construction ensures that it will last a long time. The shirt is comfortable to wear and provides a perfect fit. It has a stylish design that makes it perfect for casual wear. The Rothco P/T Marines T-Shirt is the perfect choice for any occasion.

813.displayed_text:
Prompt

Given a item title and item features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item title:
Rothco P/T Marines T-Shirt

Item features:
100% Polyester
Quality tested and ensured for maximum durability
Designed with only the toughest, roughest users in mind
Comfort and Performance come hand in hand with Rothco

Product description:

Response A

Rothco makes quality outdoor and sports gear for all types of situations. Whether you are in a combat-intensive environment, or if you are a recreational user, Rothco will fit the lifestyle of many. Quality tested for maximum durability, comfort and performance come hand in hand with Rothco. This Marines T-Shirt is made of 100% polyester.

Response B

The Rothco P/T Marines T-Shirt is made of high-quality polyester and is designed to withstand tough and rigorous use. Its durable construction ensures that it will last a long time. The shirt is comfortable to wear and provides a perfect fit. It has a stylish design that makes it perfect for casual wear. The Rothco P/T Marines T-Shirt is the perfect choice for any occasion.
